name: EverCommerce, Inc.
description: EverCommerce, Inc. is a leading service commerce platform that offers a comprehensive suite of software solutions tailored to the needs of service-based businesses. Founded in 1999, EverCommerce empowers professionals across various industries, including health and wellness, home services, and fitness, to manage their operations effectively and grow their businesses. The company provides cloud-based software that encompasses appointment scheduling, billing and invoicing, customer relationship management (CRM), and marketing tools, enabling businesses to streamline their operations and enhance customer engagement. With a strong focus on innovation, EverCommerce continuously enhances its platform through strategic acquisitions and partnerships, making it a trusted partner for service professionals. The company's mission is to help service businesses thrive by providing the tools they need to succeed in an increasingly competitive landscape. EverCommerce serves thousands of businesses across North America, helping them improve efficiency, boost revenues, and deliver exceptional customer experiences. The company is committed to driving the digital transformation of service industries, offering solutions that integrate seamlessly with existing workflows. As the demand for digital services grows, EverCommerce is well-positioned to lead the charge, leveraging technology to empower service businesses of all sizes.
